General.Name: Ace Global Business Acquisition Ltd Unit
General.Description: Ace Global Business Acquisition Limited does not have significant operations. The company intends to effect a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, recapitalization, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. It intends to focus on businesses in the Greater China, Japan, and Southeast Asia regions. Ace Global Business Acquisition Limited was incorporated in 2020 and is based in Admiralty, Hong Kong.
